org.ensembl.registry
Interface RegistryLoader

All Known Implementing Classes:
RegistryLoaderIni, RegistryLoaderJython
public interface RegistryLoader

Interface for classes that can load DriverGroups into a registry. Algorithms that implement registry loaders should implement this class. This interface defines the interface part of the Strategy design pattern.

Author:
Craig Melsopp

Method Summary
 void load(Registry registry)
          Loads DriverGroups into _registry_.
 

Method Detail

load

public void load(Registry registry)
Loads DriverGroups into _registry_.

Parameters:
registry - registry to load DriverGroups into.
